tool.name: Mauve Contig Mover
tool.command:
#if $ref_select.ref_source == "db" #set $index = $ref_select.ref_db #else if $ref_select.ref_source == "meta" #set $index = $data.metadata.dbkey #else if $ref_select.ref_source == "key" #set $index = $ref_select.key #else #set $index = None #set $ref = $ref_select.ref #if $ref.is_of_type("genbank") ln -sf $ref `basename $ref`.gbk && #set $ref = $os.path.basename(str($ref)) + ".gbk" #end if #end if
#if $index ## Get path to database file #set $ref = next(record for record in $__app__.tool_data_tables['all_fasta'].get_fields() if str( x[0] ) == str( $index ))[-1] #end if
#if $draft.is_of_type("genbank") ln -sf $draft `basename ${draft}.gbk` && #set $draft_path = $os.path.basename(str($draft)) + ".gbk" #else #set $draft_path = str($draft) #end if
MauveCM -output output -ref $ref -draft $draft_path && ln -sf output/`ls -1 output | tail -n1` final && ln -sf "`ls -1 final/*.backbone | tail -n1`" final.backbone && ln -sf "`ls -1 final/*_contigs.tab | tail -n1`" final.contigs.tab && #if $draft.is_of_type("genbank") ln -sf "`ls -1 final/*_features.tab | tail -n1`" final.features.tab && #end if ln -sf "`ls -1 final/*.fas | tail -n1`" final.reordered
